name: The Dour Dice Tower
description:
Climb a Demonic Dice Tower. Every time you dodge roll, your weapon in rerolled. Spend gold on new weapons to power up and increase your odds of victory!

Each Face of your Die represents a weapon.  Arm yourself with the best possible arsenal to take down the monstrous D-ColloSix

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Aim with the mouse.
  • Dodge with Spacebar
  • Shoot with Left Click
  • Open The Shop with Escape
